meanings.definition: A person who owns and lives on a homestead.
meanings.sent1: The homesteaders in our town grow their own vegetables.
meanings.sent2: Many homesteaders raise chickens for fresh eggs.
meanings.sent3: The homesteaders had a friendly competition to see who could grow the biggest pumpkin.
meanings.sent4: The community of homesteaders was like a big family, always helping each other out.
meanings.sent5: The children were fascinated by the homesteaders' simple way of life.

meanings.definition: The act of settling on and cultivating land as a homesteader.
meanings.sent1: Homesteading requires hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent2: The history of homesteading in America is fascinating.
meanings.sent3: The homesteading adventure turned out to be more challenging than they expected.
meanings.sent4: Homesteading is like painting a picture on a blank canvas, creating something beautiful from scratch.
meanings.sent5: The homesteading lifestyle is all about self-sufficiency and independence.
